titleStmt.title: Certayne psalmes chosen out of the psalter of Dauid, commonlye called the .vii. penytentiall psalmes, drawen into englyshe meter by Sir Thomas Wyat knyght, wherunto is added a prolage of [the] auctore before euery psalme, very pleasau[n]t [and] profettable to the godly reader
Bible. O.T. Psalms. English. Wyatt.
titleStmt.author: Wyatt, Thomas, Sir, 1503?-1542.
Harington, John, d. 1582.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Paules Churchyarde, at the sygne of thee Starre, By Thomas Raynald. and [i.e. for] Iohn Harryngton,

notesStmt.note: Translated by Sir Thomas Wyatt (in part from Pietro Aretino's "Parafrasi" of 1534). Edited by John Harington--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
